description_for_model: Convert JSON content to TOON (Token-Oriented Object Notation) format to significantly reduce token usage. TOON format removes redundant symbols like braces, brackets, and quotes while maintaining data structure clarity, reducing token consumption by 30-60%.
description_for_human: 将 JSON 内容转换为 TOON 格式，大幅降低 token 使用量。TOON 格式通过移除冗余符号（如大括号、中括号和引号）来减少 30-60% 的 token 消耗。
